page.title: 06ECOLOGY - FOOTPATHS
page.content: FOOTPATH 30/48 Crwbin - Limestone Hill farm starts on Crwbin - Capel Dyddgen road through fields to above farm. FOOTPATH 30/49 Drysgeirch Mill to Alltycadno starts opposite mill, passes Ivy Cottage and Wern Farm, through fields, crossing Nant Drysgeirch to Alltycadno. FOOTPATH 30/50 Felindref-Pant Alltycadno-Tynewydd road starts at Felindref through fields passing Ffrwd Farm to road. FOOTPATH 30/51 Felinganol to Footpath 30/49 starts near Felinganol through trees along Nant Drysgeirch to meet Footpath 30/49. FOOTPATH 30/52 Felinganol to Pontantwn starts near Felinganol, through trees and along Nant Drysgeirch to meet Footpath 30/53.
